tweet: ⚡️Giveaway! ⚡️  To celebrate Cardano (ADA) being integrated with Ledger in Yoroi Wallet, EMURGO is giving away 3 Yoroi branded Ledgers to 3 random winners! Ledger and @emurgo_io are thrilled to announce that the @Cardano app is now available for the Ledger Nano S!  Possibly the most requested #crypto by our community, you can now store your $ADA securely with a Nano S through the Yoroi Wallet  Read more:  https://t.co/bVcAAG1sFv #ADA  https://t.co/AddkRfV87J

Cardano is now supported by Ledger! This initiative has been sponsored by the Cardano Foundation through funding the development of the Cardano Ledger app and associated software libraries. Read the full blog here:  https://t.co/EuTp0R9p7u

$500 worth of either $TEL / $ADA 🎉WINNER’s CHOICE!🎉  Follow to enter : 1. Like & RT 2. Follow @Crypto_KenL0L & @TheRealKentechy   IF NOT ALL DONE, YOU WILL NOT BE PICKED!  Only given away if 500 likes and 500 RT is hit!  GOOD LUCK! #cardano #telcoin

Cardano + Ledger + Yoroi Fact  ADApters: One thing to note is that Chrome doesn't push out automatic updates right away. Some people may have to wait a bit or a day for their Yoroi to automatically update to the latest version with Ledger support but it's here! RT

Cardano + Ledger + Yoroi Fact  ADApters: Also, you can't have multiple wallets in Yoroi. This means users with an existing Yoroi wallet will have to create a new Chrome account and install Yoroi on their new account to use Ledger. RT!

Cardano + Ledger + Yoroi Fact  #ADApters: Please note that Ledger is supported on Yoroi Wallet for now. If you are using Ledger Live, Cardano is not supported on this version! RT!
